tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE refugees (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  country_of_origin VARCHAR(100),
  refugee_status VARCHAR(50),
  resettlement_status VARCHAR(50),
  support_needed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE refugees_rights (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  country_of_origin VARCHAR(50),
  refugee_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE resettlement_efforts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  refugee_id INT,
  resettlement_location VARCHAR(100),
  support_received BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (refugee_id) REFERENCES refugees_rights(id)
);

CREATE TABLE refugees_rights (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    country_of_origin VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE resettlement_efforts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(50),
    organization_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE support_services (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    contact_person VARCHAR(50),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE refugees (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  country_of_origin VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  arrival_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE resettlement_agencies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(50),
  contact_person VARCHAR(50),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE services_providers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(50),
  type VARCHAR(50),
  contact_person VARCHAR(50),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE support_activities (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(50),
  date DATE,
  time TIME,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE rights (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(50),
    deadline DATE
)

CREATE TABLE resettlement (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    applicant_id INT,
    country VARCHAR(50),
    approval_status VARCHAR(50),
    date_applied DATE
)

CREATE TABLE coordination (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    coordinator VARCHAR(50),
    organization VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    contact_person VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE support (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    contact VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE documents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_name VARCHAR(50),
    file_path VARCHAR(100),
    date_uploaded TIMESTAMP
)
